mapper.sql: Id, user_name, password, age, birth_day, cell_phone, open_id, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into user (Id, user_name, password, age, birth_day, cell_phone, open_id, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
